author: Laurie Penny
title: This Is Not the Apocalypse You Were Looking For
description: Pop culture has been inundated with catastrophe porn for decades. None of it has prepared us for our new reality.
content: The shock itself is shocking. Shouldnt we have been more prepared? Hasnt culture been drenched in catastrophe porn for decades? The bomb. The breakdown. The fallout. The senseless armies of shambling corpses, all the nightmares of dead generations sliding out… [+4899 chars]
